title: save does not save new commits in specific subdataset
body:
```
% git st
On branch master
Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by 2 commits.
  (use "git push" to publish your local commits)

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
        modified:   fmriprep (new commits)

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

% datalad -l debug save -m "Last trial runs"  fmriprep
[DEBUG  ] Command line args 1st pass. Parsed: Namespace() Unparsed: ['save', '-m', 'Last trial runs', 'fmriprep'] 
[DEBUG  ] Discovering plugins 
[DEBUG  ] Building doc for <class 'datalad.core.local.status.Status'> 
[DEBUG  ] Building doc for <class 'datalad.core.local.save.Save'> 
[DEBUG  ] Parsing known args among ['/usr/bin/datalad', '-l', 'debug', 'save', '-m', 'Last trial runs', 'fmriprep'] 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.core.local.save.Save'> 
[DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for saving: /data/project/enki/processed 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.core.local.status.Status'> 
[DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for status reporting: /data/project/enki/processed 
[DEBUG  ] query AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed/fmriprep).diffstatus() for paths: [] 
[DEBUG  ] AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed/fmriprep).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard', '-o'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard', '-o'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed/fmriprep).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed/fmriprep).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-tree', 'HEAD', '-z', '-r', '--full-tree', '-l'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-tree', 'HEAD', '-z', '-r', '--full-tree', '-l'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed/fmriprep).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Determined 1 datasets for saving from input arguments 

% git st
On branch master
Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by 2 commits.
  (use "git push" to publish your local commits)

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
        modified:   fmriprep (new commits)

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

% datalad status
 modified: fmriprep (dataset)
```

but works without a path given:

```
% datalad -l debug save -m "Last trial runs"
[DEBUG  ] Command line args 1st pass. Parsed: Namespace() Unparsed: ['save', '-m', 'Last trial runs'] 
[DEBUG  ] Discovering plugins 
[DEBUG  ] Building doc for <class 'datalad.core.local.status.Status'> 
[DEBUG  ] Building doc for <class 'datalad.core.local.save.Save'> 
[DEBUG  ] Parsing known args among ['/usr/bin/datalad', '-l', 'debug', 'save', '-m', 'Last trial runs'] 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.core.local.save.Save'> 
[DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for saving: /data/project/enki/processed 
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.core.local.status.Status'> 
[DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for status reporting: /data/project/enki/processed 
[DEBUG  ] query AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed).diffstatus() for paths: None 
[DEBUG  ] AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard', '-o'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-files', '--stage', '-z', '-d', '-m', '--exclude-standard', '-o'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Query repo: ['git', 'ls-tree', 'HEAD', '-z', '-r', '--full-tree', '-l'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done query repo: ['git', 'ls-tree', 'HEAD', '-z', '-r', '--full-tree', '-l'] 
[DEBUG  ] Done AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed).get_content_info(...) 
[DEBUG  ] Determined 1 datasets for saving from input arguments 
[DEBUG  ] 1 submodule path(s) to stage in AnnexRepo('/data/project/enki/processed') {'fmriprep': {'state': 'modified', 'type': 'dataset', 'gitshasum': 'a022289dd4c4884dfea2bf4b070e1454b92294a5', 'prev_gitshasum': 'a022289dd4c4884dfea2bf4b070e1454b92294a5'}} 
[DEBUG  ] Process file list chunk 0 (length 1) 
add(ok): fmriprep (file)
[DEBUG  ] 1 path(s) to add to AnnexRepo(/data/project/enki/processed) {'fmriprep': {'state': 'modified', 'type': 'dataset', 'gitshasum': 'a022289dd4c4884dfea2bf4b070e1454b92294a5', 'prev_gitshasum': 'a022289dd4c4884dfea2bf4b070e1454b92294a5'}}

[DEBUG  ] Launching process ['git', 'commit', '-m', 'Last trial runs', '--'] 
[DEBUG  ] Process 2702452 started 
[DEBUG  ] Waiting for process 2702452 to complete 
[DEBUG  ] Process 2702452 exited with return code 0 
[DEBUG  ] No sync necessary, no corresponding branch detected

  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
```
